tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2019-12-05 09:52:16" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="As it currently stands, the installer doesn't come with any of the Steam Client files so that your server will be joinable or even show in the public list. If you start your server and the first line doesn't say Setting breakpad minidump AppID = 529180, this is the fix. Copy the following files from C:\ROOTFOLDER\dnl\ to C:\ROOTFOLDER\DNL\Binaries\Win64\ on the server

steamclient64.dll
tier0_s64.dll
vstdlib_s64.dll" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2023-06-13 16:30:27" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION" value="4" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION_UPDATE" value="2023-06-13 16:30:28" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template:
[ServerSettings] RCONPort=$[Service.RConPort] AutoDestroyOldStructuresMultiplier=1.000000 ForceDemolishStructureMultiplier=1.000000 StackSizeMultiplier=1.000000 StackWeightMultiplier=1.000000 ItemWeightScale=1.000000 PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultiplier=1.000000 KickIdlePlayersPeriod=2400.000000 PerPlatformMaxStructuresMultiplier=1.000000 AutoSavePeriodMinutes=30.000000 ListenServerTetherDistanceMultiplier=1.000000 MaxTamedDinos=5000.000000 RCONServerGameLogBuffer=600.000000
[/Script/DNL.ShooterGameUserSettings] MasterAudioVolume=1.000000 MusicAudioVolume=1.000000 SFXAudioVolume=1.000000 VoiceAudioVolume=1.000000 UIScaling=1.000000 CameraShakeScale=1.000000 bFirstPersonRiding=False bDoubleClickToEvade=True bEvadeWithCrouchButton=True bPreventDefaultItemsAfterRespawn=False bShowStatusNotificationMessages=True TrueSkyQuality=0.700000 FOVMultiplier=1.000000 GroundClutterDensity=1.000000 bFilmGrain=False bAllowHDR=False bMotionBlur=False bUseDFAO=False bUseSSAO=True bShowChatBox=True bCameraViewBob=True bInvertLookY=False bFloatingNames=True bChatBubbles=True bHideServerInfo=False bJoinNotifications=False bCraftablesShowAllItems=True bLocalInventoryShowAllItems=False bRemoteInventoryShowAllItems=False LookLeftRightSensitivity=1.000000 LookUpDownSensitivity=1.000000 GraphicsQuality=1 ActiveLingeringWorldTiles=10 ClientNetQuality=3 LastServerSearchType=0 LastServerSearchHideFull=False LastServerSearchProtected=False HideItemTextOverlay=False bDistanceFieldShadowing=True LODScalar=1.000000 bToggleToTalk=False HighQualityMaterials=True HighQualitySurfaces=True bTemperatureF=False bDisableTorporEffect=False bChatShowSteamName=False bChatShowTribeName=True EmoteKeyBind1=0 EmoteKeyBind2=0 EmoteKeyBindLaughing=0 EmoteKeyBindSorry=0 bNoBloodEffects=False bLowQualityVFX=False bSpectatorManualFloatingNames=False bSuppressAdminIcon=False bUseSimpleDistanceMovement=False bDisableMeleeCameraSwingAnims=False bUseLowQualityLevelStreaming=False LastPVESearchType=-1 LastDLCTypeSearchType=-1 bUseVSync=False MacroCtrl0= MacroCtrl1= MacroCtrl2= MacroCtrl3= MacroCtrl4= MacroCtrl5= MacroCtrl6= MacroCtrl7= MacroCtrl8= MacroCtrl9= ResolutionSizeX=1280 ResolutionSizeY=720 LastUserConfirmedResolutionSizeX=1280 LastUserConfirmedResolutionSizeY=720 WindowPosX=-1 WindowPosY=-1 bUseDesktopResolutionForFullscreen=False LastConfirmedFullscreenMode=0 Version=5
[SessionSettings] SessionName=$[HostName]
[ScalabilityGroups] sg.ResolutionQuality=100 sg.ViewDistanceQuality=3 sg.AntiAliasingQuality=3 sg.ShadowQuality=3 sg.PostProcessQuality=3 sg.TextureQuality=3 sg.EffectsQuality=3 sg.TrueSkyQuality=3 sg.GroundClutterQuality=3 sg.IBLQuality=1 sg.HeightFieldShadowQuality=3 sg.GroundClutterRadius=10000
[/Game/DNL/BaseResource/BaseBP/TestGameMode.TestGameMode_C] IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount=15.000000 bServerGameLogEnabled=True
[/Script/Engine.GameSession] MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots]
